thread.section_title: Travel News, Tips, and Guides - USATODAY.com
thread.title: 10Best Readers' Choice: Destination winners announced!

title: 10Best Readers' Choice: Destination winners announced!
text:
We asked 10Best readers to vote on their favorite travel destinations. Check out the winning cities! (Photo: Dave & Les Jacobs, Getty Images/Blend Images)
10 CONNECT 18 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE Travel means different things to different people; some go for the shopping, others for the history or art scene, and still others for a taste of adventure. For the last four weeks, USA TODAY 10Best readers have been voting on their favorite U.S. cities in the 10Best Readers' Choice categories of Best Destination for Culturephiles , Best Destination for History Buffs , Best Destination for Luxury Travelers , Best Destination for Outdoor Enthusiasts and Best Destination for Shopaholics .
10best.com readers' choose their favorite spots for culture, history, shopping, outdoor fun and luxury traveling! VPC
The winners of each category are as follows:
Best Destination for Culturephiles
Santa Fe took home three wins, including Best Destination for Culturephiles. (Photo: MarkKane.net)
Santa Fe Indianapolis Houston Phoenix Minneapolis New York Philadelphia Memphis New Orleans Chicago Best Destination for History Buffs
Gettysburg, Penn. won the title of Best Destination for History Buffs. (Photo: Destination Gettysburg)
Gettysburg, Penn. Montgomery, Ala. Philadelphia Williamsburg, Va. St. Augustine, Fla. Savannah, Ga. Newport, R.I. Galveston, Texas Charleston, S.C. Boston Best Destination for Luxury Travelers
Readers voted Naples, Fla. as America's best destination for luxury travelers. (Photo: Naples Marco Island Everglades CVB)
Naples, Fla. Beverly Hills Lanai, Hawaii Aspen, Colo. Maui, Hawaii Las Vegas Scottsdale, Ariz. Vail, Colo. Kauai, Hawaii Newport, R.I. Best Destination for Outdoor Enthusiasts
New Mexico's capital was voted as the nation's best destination for outdoor enthusiasts. (Photo: MarkKane.net)
Santa Fe Durango, Colo. Tahoe, Calif./Nev. Rapid City, S.D. Islamorada, Fla. Bozeman, Mont. Asheville, N.C. Bend, Ore. Jackson Hole, Wyo. Missoula, Mont. Best Destination for Shopaholics
Santa Fe was also voted the best shopping destination in the USA. (Photo: Stacie Standifer)
Santa Fe Palm Beach, Fla. Carmel, Calif. Malibu, Calif. Nashville New York Chicago Philadelphia Scottsdale, Ariz. Atlanta Congratulations to all our winning cities. Vote daily for your favorites in other categories at 10Best.com .
10 CONNECT 18 TWEET LINKEDIN //usat.ly/1KuwGsp TOP VIDEOS
